text: The No Fly List is a list of people who are not allowed to travel on airplanes that are going into, within, or out of the United States. The list is maintained by the United States government's Transportation Security Administration. In 2023 a Swiss hacker found and shared through the Internet a version of the list from 2019. ==In popular media== In the film Alvin and the Chipmunks 4: The Road Chip, the Chipmunks are added to the No Fly List. == References == Category:Security Category:Air travel
title: No fly list
